description: Nerine, or Rin, is a character from the visual novel/anime series Shuffle!. She is from the demon world and attends Verbana Academy. She became one of the prime marriage candidates for Rin Tsuchimi, the lead male character in the series. While her cooking skills are poor, her magic capabilities are impressive, with enough destructive power to level entire city blocks. Her grades in school are also excellent.
name: Nerine
